User’s documentation¶

User authentication¶

On the first access you will be presented the following screen which states that you need to authenticate. Click on the authenticate button to be redirected on the Central Authentication Service.

On the following screen you will be asked to enter your credentials. If you don’t have any credentials yet, you have to request the creation of an account by clicking on the sign up link.

The following screen depicts the process of requesting the creation of a new account on a DIBBS plateform. After the submission of this form, you will be redirected to the previous screen and you will be able to sign-in.

Managing OpenStack credentials¶

The DIBBS platform needs to have access to some OpenStack credentials in order to spawn computing resources that will host the execution of operations.

To access to the credential management page, click on your username on the top-right corner, and then click on the Credentials button as depicted in the following screen:

You will land on the following screen which enables to see the credentials you already registered in the DIBBS platform.

To add new credentials to the DIBBS platform, please click on the + Add Credentials located in the top-right corner. You will land on the following form.
